alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 6:18PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Juab... western Utah and southern Tooele Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 618 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Dugway Proving Ground Test Range to 14 miles south of Dugway English Village. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Vernon, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Utah Test and Training Range South, Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge, Little Sahara State Park and Lofgreen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
